name: Devil's Pendant Demo
description:
This is our first game, and I hope everybody likes it. We will begin work on Chapter 1 shortly.

Summary:

Officer Ethan was called back home where he didn't return for few years to attend an party. After arriving he gets involved in some murder case. There's also some seemingly supernatural things that he can't explain. He starts trying to uncover the truth about his family and his ancestors.

This game contains some strong themes like domestic violence, murder and sexual assault. Please play this  game  at your own pace  and don't puss yourself.

  • This game will contain 7 chapters
  • Multiple endings
  • Engaging storyline
  • Expected game time 30+ hours when completed
